description: Numerators of coefficients for repeated integration.
references: N. J. A. Sloane, A Handbook of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1973 (includes this sequence).
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: H. E. Salzer, Table of coefficients for repeated integration with differences, Phil. Mag., 38 (1947), 331-336.
H. E. Salzer, Table of coefficients for repeated integration with differences, Phil. Mag., 38 (1947), 331-336. [Annotated scanned copy]
mathematica: Table[Numerator@ (Sum[StirlingS1[n, k]/((k + 1) (k + 2)), {k, n}]/n!), {n, 20}] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Apr 06 2016 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: Corrected and edited by Herman Jamke (hermanjamke(AT)fastmail.fm), Aug 01 2010
